snippet: Installers, often working through big-box chains, are taking advantage of hefty tax breaks, creative financing and cheap Chinese-made panels to make solar power accessible to the mass market.
abstract: Solar panel Installers, often working through big-box chains, are taking advantage of hefty tax breaks, creative financing and cheap Chinese-made panels to make solar power accessible to the mass market; number of residential and commercial installations more than doubled over the last two years to 213,957.
lead_paragraph: Installers, often working through big-box chains, are taking advantage of hefty tax breaks, creative financing and cheap Chinese-made panels to make solar power accessible to the mass market.

headline.seo: Solar Installers Offer Homeowners Deals, Gaining Converts
headline.main: Solar Installers Offer Deals, Gaining Converts
